original_text: I have heard of you that the spirit of the gods is in you, and that light and understanding and excellent wisdom are found in you.
korean_text: 내가 네게 대하여 들은즉 네 안에는 신들의 영이 있으므로 네가 명철과 총명과 비상한 지혜가 있다 하도다

sentences.original_text: that the spirit of the gods is in you
sentences.korean_translation: 신들의 영이 당신 안에 있다는 것

sentences.original_text: and that light and understanding and excellent wisdom
